question: 鉄柵
sourceMnemonic: Ready for this one? An <kanji>iron</kanji> <kanji>fence </kanji> is an <vocabulary>iron fence</vocabulary>. Don't you love it when it's straightforward?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Be careful though, <ja>鉄</ja> is normally read as <ja>てつ</ja>, but in this case it is shortened to <ja>てっ</ja>.
